title: Ticket #163: Jobs get stuck permenently in X state
description: This appears to be a strange interaction between SYSTEM_PERIODIC_REMOVE and jobs submitted with leave_in_queue = true. I'm going to try and reproduce the issue locally and go from there.
remarks:
2009-Feb-03 08:28:22 by gquinn:
The user is setting leave_in_queue to True. This is preventing the job from ever leaving the queue (via SYSTEM_PERIODIC_REMOVE or condor_rm). This runs counter to leave_in_queue's documented behavior, where "the job remains in the queue until the user runs condor_rm to remove the job from the queue".

I have suggested a workaround, but we should resolve this code/documentation inconsistency. I plan to bring this up in the FW meeting today.

2009-Feb-03 14:04:30 by gquinn:
I've fixed the error in the leave_in_queue description on the condor_submit man page.
